post.body: So you're saying that I just exist at the computer at TIY? O.o
I fully agree with that idea! When can we start? ;)
Wall and floor included - Friday morning/aft = Randi - evening I'll be around
Randi was able to get a Jingle sofa - so now we have a full Jingle set for you, whenever you want to come visit ^^
The next day there will be a bulletin saying a bridge will be built, then vote on location at city hall,week later it gets built
LULZ I guess 20 minutes of practicing Guitar Hero doesn't make me be able to play Through the Fire & Flames well
Added some cat pictures to Myspace. Still need to upload some Christmas pics to Flickr
Randi made hash & eggs for lunch, then we watched 2nd Futurama "movie", paid and sent bills and played AC - internet time now
"Shot through the heart and you're to blame, you give love a bad name" </rock out> ^^
oh yeah - something about a new year too
Woke up - did some dishes - made coffee - now trying to warm up
Randi's warming up a pizza for dinner ^^
Thankfully the day got better - now i'm home from work having a taco and drinking coffee ^^
*grumble* I'm about half a step from going back to bed - definately NOT the way to start a day
watched the first 2 disks of Haruhi Suzumiya, now its time for bed
Went to visit the PR's - epic Guitar hero/Christmas/video making - lots of fun ^^
Home from work
Coffee then going to work - had some weird dreams last night O.o
time for bed
Making some Rani-chow (triple pepperoni pizza rolls) while Randi plays some AC
